Interface SerializedMT

All Superinterfaces:
MT, java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
SerializedMTImpl
public interface SerializedMT
extends MT

Extension of the standard RMI interface that uses preserialized byte arrays instead of AttributedMessages.
